# Tender Announcement and Request for Proposal: MAXIMO Configuration Changes

## Title
MAXIMO Configuration Changes

## Tender Number
cb-8961-8017532

## Amendment Number
6

## Solicitation Number
21120-24-4242746/C

## Tender Closing Date
[2023-10-03T14:00:00](https://www.date converter.com/2023-10-03T14:00:00)

## Background and Objective
The Correctional Service of Canada requires the services of a company experienced in MAXIMO CMMS from IBM to complete software configuration changes based on updated business processes since the original configuration. The contractor must develop training material and new data management for building condition reports, and implement regulatory and non-regulatory maintenance at all sites, with a focus on the Ontario region.

## Required Services
The services required include:

* Senior Application/Software Architect
* Intermediate Programmer/Analyst
* Intermediate Data Conversion Specialist
* Intermediate Instructor, Information Technology

## Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

## Tendering Procedures
All interested suppliers may submit a bid. The competitive procurement strategy is the lowest priced compliant bid.

## Security Requirements
This contract includes security requirements.

## Contract Duration
The contract duration is one (1) year from the date of contract award.

## File Number
21120-24-4242746/C

Jason St-Onge

## Contact Information
